name: Crazy Train (itch)
description:
Railway is the greatest human invention. Thanks to it we managed to cross the desert steppes of the Wild West.

It is not as simple as it may seem, my friend.Collect coal to continue driving, but watch out! Too much of it will blow up the boiler! Beware of mined stations!

Are you brave enough to face the challenges of traveling across the continent?Team:
  • Pavel 'WatchMan' Nikalayeu
  • Karol 'Sobi' Sobański
  • Michał ' Timberin'  Winkler
  • Miłosz Szymczak 
  • Tomek Lich Bigoński
  • Dawid  'Stołek' Stołyhwo
